Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 115th/Normal

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Loyola
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Loyola due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Loyola due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
